entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 08:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: S 25 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening and after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
